mapper.select: SELECT games.id_game as idGame, games.name as name, games.release_date as releaseDate FROM games inner join price on games.id_game = price.id_game where price.sale > 0
SELECT id_game as idGame, name as name FROM games WHERE status = 1 LIMIT #{a} OFFSET #{b}
SELECT id_game as idGame, name as name, description as description FROM games WHERE status = 1 AND highlight = 1

SELECT id_game as idGame, id_esrb as idEsrb, id_developer as idDeveloper, name as name, description as description, size as size, players as players, release_date as releaseDate, processor as processor, memory as memory, graphics as graphics, color as color, highlight as highlight, download_path as downloadPath, status as status, tx_id=#{txId}, tx_host=#{txHost}, tx_user_id=#{txUserId}, tx_date=#{txDate} FROM games WHERE status=1
